hanzi-su-wiki:
緯

Значения

Горизонтальная линяя; широта

Мнемоника

Горизонтальная прямая похожа на растянутую 韋 нитку 糸.

Варианты

纬

wěi
latitude; woof (horizontal thread in weaving); weft
широта; гав (горизонтальная нить в плетении); уток

heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman buys a locket for Mary Jane because he wants to get latitude (horizontal/sideways) with her.
heisig_constituent: horizontal, thread, spiderman, locket, stick, key, mouth, monocle, sunglasses with one lens missing
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: горизонтальный, гав, левый и усилитель; право, широта
koohiiStory1: The thread that holds the locket around my neck is choker-length so it stays horizontal.
koohiiStory2: Hint : this kanji also means "latitude", which are the horizontal lines on a globe. Do you remember James Heisig's story for frame 175 "black ink" ? Here a cartographer on a ship, is using his "thread locket" to mark horizontal lines on a map. He pulls a chalked thread from the locket, and snaps it to mark horizontal lines. Imagine the "thread-locket" in the shape of a globe, filled with dark powder and a little bobbin of thread.
jp_example_words:
経緯(いきさつ): details, whole story, sequence of events, particulars, how it started, how things got this way, complications, position
緯度(いど): latitude (geography)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The thread that goes through Korea is the latitude line splitting up North and South Korea.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info:
Why thread? Back in the old days globes were sewn together with cloth and thread, so there was a literal thread dividing the Koreas!
Or you can just picture an actual, super long piece of thread going around the entire globe. That works too.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The only way you can see this latitude line is to ride an eagle (い) over it. The line isn't visible from a car, you're too close, and a plane is too high. You have to see it from an eagle's point of view.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine being an eagle yourself, flying around the entire globe, following the latitude line that splits Korea down the middle.
Ru_Meaning: horizontal, woof, left & right, (parallels of) latitude, prediction
Ru_Radicals: 口 (рот), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить), 韋 (дублёная кожа)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thread (糸) fastening the tanned leather (韋) should be horizontal
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spidey sneakily threw a sticky location tracker on the villain's back while hiding in the briar patch.  Unfortunately it malfunctioned and only gave latitude information but not longitude.
humanum_full_description_en: "Said the text": ".. Weft weave wefts also from Shito Wei sound" Wei word is very typical of Phonogram, " Wei " in the original meaning is to defend the " Guardian ", marked only sound in the weft word, To refer to the horizontally running silk on the loom, distinguished from the vertical running " warp ". Later generations "longitude and latitude" are collectively called, from the initial "weaving silk" to "jingshu" and "weishu" and "longitude and latitude" in contemporary geography.
humanum_short_description_en: " Weft " refers to the horizontal thread on the loom, distinguished from the longitudinal " warp ".
humanum_full_description: 《說文》：「緯， 織橫絲也。从糸韋聲。」緯字是很典型的形聲字，「韋」的本義是保衛的「衛」，在緯字中只標聲，以指織機上橫行的絲，以別於縱走的「經」。後世「經緯」合稱，由最初的「織絲」，漸及於「經書」與「緯書」和現世地理學中的「經緯度」。
humanum_short_description: 「緯」指織機上橫行的絲，以別於縱走的「經」。

  • ⿰ Left to right

①織布時用梭穿織的橫紗，編織物的橫線，與“經”相對：緯線。緯紗。經緯。
②地理學上指在地面上的與赤道平行的線：緯度。
③東西的橫路：緯陌。
④行星的古稱：緯星。
⑤書名：古七緯(指中國漢代以神學迷信附會儒家經義的書)。
⑥編織：緯蕭(用蒿草編成簾子)。

《說文》：「緯， 織橫絲也。从糸韋聲。」緯字是很典型的形聲字，「 韋 」的本義是保衛的「 衛 」，在緯字中只標聲，以指織機上橫行的絲，以別於縱走的「 經 」。後世「經緯」合稱，由最初的「織絲」，漸及於「經書」與「緯書」和現世地理學中的「經緯度」。
"Said the text": ".. Weft weave wefts also from Shito Wei sound" Wei word is very typical of Phonogram, " Wei" in the original meaning is to defend the " Guardian", marked only sound in the weft word, To refer to the horizontally running silk on the loom, distinguished from the vertical running " warp". Later generations "longitude and latitude" are collectively called, from the initial "weaving silk" to "jingshu" and "weishu" and "longitude and latitude" in contemporary geography.

緯字的基本解释

緯
wěi
见“纬”。

緯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》于貴切，去未，云。］
［《集韻》羽鬼切，上尾，云。］
“葦2”的被通假字。“纬1”的繁体字。
(1)织物的横线。与“經”相对。
(2)东西向的道路或土地。与南北向的“經”相对。
(3)地理学上所假想为地球上与赤道平行的南北分度线。在赤道以北的叫北纬，以南的叫南纬。
(4)行星的总称。
(5)纬书的省称。
(6)编织。
(7)治理。
(8)安排组织。
(9)古筝上的弦。
(10)拴系；扎束。
(11)姓。见《广韵·去未》。

緯字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緯； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页931第26
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】于貴切【正韻】于位切，?音胃。【說文】織橫絲也。【釋名】緯，圍也。反覆圍繞，以爲經也。【左傳·昭二十四年】嫠不恤其緯。【註】織者常苦緯少。【莊子·列禦?】江上有家貧緯蕭而食者。【音義】緯，織也。　又【周禮·天官·冢宰體國經野疏】南北之道謂之經，東西之道謂之緯。　又【周禮·春官·大宗伯日月星辰註】星謂五緯。【疏】五緯，卽五星。言緯者，二十八宿隨天左轉爲經，五星右旋爲緯。　又圖緯。【司馬貞·三皇本紀】圖緯所載。　又【集韻】羽鬼切，音偉。【博雅】束也。【夏小正】農緯厥耒。　又【韻補】叶呼韋切。【劉向·九歎】慶忌囚于阱室兮，陳不占戰而赴圍。破伯牙之號鐘兮，挾人箏而彈緯。

緯字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
緯字的起名意思

暂无。

latitude
Basic explanation of words
latitude
wěi
See "Weft".
latitude
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" Yu Guiqie, Quwei, Yun. ]
["Jiyun" Yugui cut, upper tail, cloud. ]
"Wei 2" was passed falsely. Traditional Chinese characters for "Weft 1".
(1) The horizontal lines of the fabric. Contrast with "jing".
(2) East-west roads or land. Contrast with the north-south "jing".
(3) Geographically, it is assumed to be the north-south division line parallel to the equator on the earth. Those north of the equator are called north latitudes, and those south of the equator are called south latitudes.
(4) The general term for planets.
(5) The provincial name of Weishu.
(6) Weaving.
(7) Governance.
(8) Arrange for organization.
(9) Strings on the Guzheng.
(10) Tie; tie.
(11) Last name. See "Guangyun·Quwei".
latitude

Repeatedly around, thinking that the classics are also. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty-fourth Year of the Show] He did not show his love to Qiwei. [Note] Weavers are often bitter and less weft. [Zhuangzi Lieyu?] There is a poor eater on the river. [Sound and meaning] Weft, weave.　[Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Zhong Zai Ti Guo Jing Ye Shu] The north-south road is called the longitude, and the east-west road is called the latitude.　[Zhou Li·Chunguan·Da Zongbo Sun, Moon and Stars Note】The stars are the five latitudes. 【Sparse】Five latitudes, five stars. For those who speak weft, the twenty-eight constellations turn left as longitude with the sky, and the five stars turn right as latitude.　Weft again. Old glyph
latitude
Name meaning
Nothing.
wěi
вм. 纬
Radicals: 糸, 韋  (thread, korea)
Meaning Mnemonic
The thread that goes through Korea is the latitude line splitting up North and South Korea.
Why thread? Back in the old days globes were sewn together with cloth and thread, so there was a literal thread dividing the Koreas!
Or you can just picture an actual, super long piece of thread going around the entire globe. That works too.
Reading Mnemonic
The only way you can see this latitude line is to ride an eagle (い) over it. The line isn't visible from a car, you're too close, and a plane is too high. You have to see it from an eagle's point of view.
Imagine being an eagle yourself, flying around the entire globe, following the latitude line that splits Korea down the middle.
